column5: Looking to take the little guy out this winter for some ice fishing.  Anyone know what manufactures make floatation suits for children.  My little guy is 6 years old.   Thanks in advance.
Not sure they make them that small. What I did was, had the boys in thier snow suits and put a PFD on them.

You must realize that you will be buying float suits every other year.  I know Helly Hansen made suits for all ages. I saw them displayed at a trade show.  I don't know if they are available in those sizes in Canada. I know mustang does not.

I just purchased a child's floater jacket from Ebay. It is made by mustang. Not sure if they make the whole suit, but I figured He could where his snow pants with them. This way he feels like one of the guys in his bright orange jacket, like everyone else. It's a Christmas present so shhhh.
iam going with auto inflate pfd for the kids then they can use it in the summer too
You dont know how much those words will mean,when you see the smile on his face.

My youngest wears a floater ( mans small) that was tailored to suit another youth ( he is small for his age) ,bought it used 3 years ago. it might be tough trying to tailor down a full size suit  to age 6 size though.  tb
